title: SET_PED_HELMET
content:
0x560A43136EB581050xED366E53// SetPedHelmet
void SET_PED_HELMET(Ped ped, BOOL bEnable);Parameters:ped: Ped index.bEnable: Boolean value that indicates whether the helmet should be worn or not.Sets whether a pedestrian should wear a helmet.
codeBlocks:
// SetPedHelmet
void SET_PED_HELMET(Ped ped, BOOL bEnable);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for SET_PED_HELMET
SetPedHelmet(ped, false)
